description: Deploys a specific version of a robot application to robots in a fleet. The robot application must have a numbered applicationVersion for consistency reasons. To create a new version, use CreateRobotApplicationVersion or see Creating a Robot Application Version.

parameters.name: deploymentConfig
parameters.description: The requested deployment configuration. concurrentDeploymentPercentage (integer) --- The percentage of robots receiving the deployment at the same time. failureThresholdPercentage (integer) --- The percentage of deployments that need to fail before stopping deployment. robotDeploymentTimeoutInSeconds (integer) --- The amount of time, in seconds, to wait for deployment to a single robot to complete. Choose a time between 1 minute and 7 days. The default is 5 hours. downloadConditionFile (dict) --- The download condition file. The bucket containing the object. The key of the object. etag (string) --- The etag of the object.

nested_params.name: concurrentDeploymentPercentage
nested_params.description: The percentage of robots receiving the deployment at the same time.

nested_params.name: failureThresholdPercentage
nested_params.description: The percentage of deployments that need to fail before stopping deployment.

nested_params.name: robotDeploymentTimeoutInSeconds
nested_params.description: The amount of time, in seconds, to wait for deployment to a single robot to complete. Choose a time between 1 minute and 7 days. The default is 5 hours.

parameters.name: clientRequestToken
parameters.description: Unique, case-sensitive identifier that you provide to ensure the idempotency of the request. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: fleet
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the fleet to deploy.

parameters.name: deploymentApplicationConfigs
parameters.description: The deployment application configuration. (dict) --- Information about a deployment application configuration. The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the robot application. The version of the application. The launch configuration. The package name. preLaunchFile (string) --- The deployment pre-launch file. This file will be executed prior to the launch file. The launch file name. postLaunchFile (string) --- The deployment post-launch file. This file will be executed after the launch file. environmentVariables (dict) --- An array of key/value pairs specifying environment variables for the robot application (string) --- (string) ---

nested_params.name: application
nested_params.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the robot application.

nested_params.name: preLaunchFile
nested_params.description: The deployment pre-launch file. This file will be executed prior to the launch file.

nested_params.name: postLaunchFile
nested_params.description: The deployment post-launch file. This file will be executed after the launch file.

nested_params.name: environmentVariables
nested_params.description: An array of key/value pairs specifying environment variables for the robot application.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: A map that contains tag keys and tag values that are attached to the deployment job. (string) --- (string) ---

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the deployment job.

nested_items.name: fleet
nested_items.description: The target fleet for the deployment job.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the deployment job.

nested_items.name: application
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the robot application.

nested_items.name: preLaunchFile
nested_items.description: The deployment pre-launch file. This file will be executed prior to the launch file.

nested_items.name: postLaunchFile
nested_items.description: The deployment post-launch file. This file will be executed after the launch file.

nested_items.name: environmentVariables
nested_items.description: An array of key/value pairs specifying environment variables for the robot application.

nested_items.name: failureReason
nested_items.description: The failure reason of the deployment job if it failed.

nested_items.name: failureCode
nested_items.description: The failure code of the simulation job if it failed:

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The time, in milliseconds since the epoch, when the fleet was created.

nested_items.name: concurrentDeploymentPercentage
nested_items.description: The percentage of robots receiving the deployment at the same time.

nested_items.name: failureThresholdPercentage
nested_items.description: The percentage of deployments that need to fail before stopping deployment.

nested_items.name: robotDeploymentTimeoutInSeconds
nested_items.description: The amount of time, in seconds, to wait for deployment to a single robot to complete. Choose a time between 1 minute and 7 days. The default is 5 hours.
